author: PMM
text: I was sent the wrong dress.  Customer service was terrible - it was impossible at first to find a phone number and I spent an hour dealing with a robot at the other end of text messages. When I finally got a real person by text I didn’t have a sure sense that the problem was understood.  I finally found a phone number after digging through old e-mails.  The woman I spoke with said there shouldn’t be a problem when I returned a less expensive dress by a different designer than was on the return slip I’d been sent. but didn’t seem to really understand.  And no one indicated whether the right dress will be sent.  When I first opened the package and saw the wrong dress, I was willing to cut TRR some slack, given the volume they deal with, but the subsequent waste of my time through completely inadequate customer service means I won’t be buying from them again.
title: Wrong dress - and then it got worse
